bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I'm sometimes red and sometimes small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a tiny creature
🌿 I live outside
🖐 Count my legs, there are six!

bug.question: I fly around at night and love the light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 I am attracted to lamps
🌙 I come out when it's dark
✨ I twinkle sometimes

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to visit pretty plants
🦋 My wings can be many different colors
🌱 I used to be a caterpillar

bug.question: I make a sticky web and catch bugs for my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I build my home in corners
🕷️ I have eight legs
🍽️ I am a hunter

bug.question: I buzz and make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I live in a hive
🌼 I fly from flower to flower
🍯 I make something sweet

bug.question: I jump really high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦗 I am often green
🎶 I make noise with my legs
🌱 I like to live in grassy areas

bug.question: I have a hard shell and crawl on the ground. Some people think I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red with black spots
🪲 I am a type of beetle
🍀 People think I bring good luck

bug.question: I munch on leaves, then make a cozy place to sleep until I turn into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I change a lot!
🍃 I eat plants
🏠 I build a chrysalis

bug.question: I live underground in a big group and carry things that are bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very strong for my size
🏠 We live in colonies
🍂 We work together to find food

bug.question: I can be green or brown and I blend into the sticks. I look just like a twig. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am hard to see
🍃 I am a master of disguise
🌳 I look like part of a tree

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not an apple. I'm cold and wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I often come from clouds
☔️ You might need an umbrella when I fall
🧊 Sometimes I can be frozen

weather.question: I am big and yellow and give you heat. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am in the sky during the day
🔥 I can make you feel warm
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like animals
🌬️ The wind moves me around
🌧️ Rain can come from me

weather.question: I can be gentle, or I can be strong, I can blow leaves all day long. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make things move
🪁 You can fly a kite with me
💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me

weather.question: I am water, frozen in the sky, I fall in winter, way up high. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very cold
🧤 You wear gloves when I fall
⛄ You can make a snowman with me

weather.question: I make a colorful arc across the sky after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors
🌦️ You often see me after a storm
💧 I need sunshine and rain to exist

weather.question: I come down hard, in little frozen balls, sometimes in the summer, I surprise us all. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen rain
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you
⚾️ I'm smaller than snowballs

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes with a storm, and I light up the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright
🌩️ I come with thunder
💥 I am a flash of electricity

weather.question: I am a very strong storm with a swirling center, I can cause lots of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I spin around really fast
🌬️ My winds are very strong
🏠 I can knock down trees and houses

weather.question: I am a period of very hot weather, often without rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🥵 It's important to drink lots of water during me
☀️ The sun shines very brightly during me
🔥 The opposite of a cold spell
